name: Jumping Box - Cube Bounce Doodle Geometry Jump
name_original: Jumping Box - Cube Bounce Doodle Geometry Jump
description:
A cute Jumping Box is trapped inexplicably but he is fearless to break out for freedom! Then comes an exciting journey-across the Bright Factory, Gloomy Warehouse, Beautiful Twilight Wood, Fantastic Ice World and Horrific Plant. 5 well-designed scenarios with 30 different levels. Along the way, annoying barriers would test Jumping Box’s courage and flexibility as well.

Delightedly, 5 different adorable characters are up to your choice with coins earned. Box Family: Dumpy Bobby, Giggling Bruno, Alien Ben, Sponge Babe and Brave Bryant. Take what you like!

How to play:
- Drag, hold and release to move the box
- Avoid those barriers and pop your way out
- 1 Life= 50 Coins
- Earn coins on your way and turn them for lives
- Cherish three lives or you have to start over

Download and start the journey!
